speaker: Murphy_Phil
text: And I urge the Legislature to once again take up the next phase of commonsense and comprehensive gun-safety reforms.

speaker: Murphy_Phil
text: And every vaccine dose is a ray of light through the dark cloud that has hung over our families.

speaker: Murphy_Phil
text: This is what building an economy that works for every family looks like.

speaker: Murphy_Phil
text: And so do so many millions of your fellow New Jerseyans who have done the very same.

speaker: Murphy_Phil
text: We will never forget the loss that has hit so many of our neighbors.

speaker: Murphy_Phil
text: And 75 percent of you have completed your primary vaccination course.

speaker: Murphy_Phil
text: The Innovation Evergreen Fund will be critical to making this goal our reality.

speaker: Murphy_Phil
text: Every dose gets us one step closer to regaining the life we knew prior to COVID.

speaker: Murphy_Phil
text: And we did it without asking customers to pay one penny more in fares for four straight years.

speaker: Murphy_Phil
text: And let’s prove that our best days aren’t in our rear-view mirror.

speaker: Murphy_Phil
text: This not only hurt our hardworking public employees, but it threatened our very financial health as a state.

speaker: Murphy_Phil
text: We are the number one state in America to raise a family.

speaker: Murphy_Phil
text: We have shown you can make economic progress and social progress at the same time.

speaker: Murphy_Phil
text: But we are making high-quality health care both more affordable and more accessible.

speaker: Murphy_Phil
text: Not in our very backyard.

speaker: Murphy_Phil
text: We inherited a state that worked for too few and which was at a crossroads.

speaker: Murphy_Phil
text: So, if you have not yet gotten your booster shot, here is what I ask of you – go get it.

speaker: Murphy_Phil
text: … To Main Street stores and restaurants where communities can once again come alive.

speaker: Murphy_Phil
text: But it should mean that “compromise” and “common sense” are not dirty words.

speaker: Murphy_Phil
text: This not only hurt our hardworking public employees, but it threatened our very financial health as a state.

speaker: Murphy_Phil
text: We still have much work to do.

speaker: Murphy_Phil
text: Science and reality tell us that what we once called “full” vaccination is no longer that.

speaker: Murphy_Phil
text: We’ve cut taxes for our middle-class and working families, and our seniors, fourteen times.

speaker: Murphy_Phil
text: For years, we were fed a line that no one wanted to be part of our New Jersey family.
